# Linear Regression {#sec-Linear_Regression}

$$
y = X \cdot \alpha + \varepsilon
$$
where $X$ is the fixed effects design matrix, $\alpha$ is the fixed effect regression coefficients, and $\varepsilon$ is the zero-mean errors.
